name: On the Road of Madness
description:
You will be in charge to find the missing sucessor of the kingdom of Ludérine, in a land, named Rimera, divided in two kingdoms, devastated by war, internal conflict and monsters coming from a mysterious cataclysm.

Members :

- Lead Artist : Jeremy Ozeroglu

- Artist : Valentin Viennot

Game Designers :

- BOURON Ludovic

- DECRESSAIN Camille

- DUPRE Thibault

- GLÉNISSON Rémi

- ROUAULT Jules
